resources.string: There are problems with the security certificate for this site.
This certificate isn\'t from a trusted authority.
The name of the site doesn\'t match the name on the certificate.
This certificate has an invalid date.
Load content faster using proxy servers
Format webpages to fit the screen
Fill out web forms with a single touch
Set up text to auto-fill in web forms
Type the text you want to auto-fill in web forms
Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.
The browser can automatically complete web forms like this one. Do you want to set up your auto-fill text?
You can always set up your auto-fill text from the Browser > Settings > General screen
Clear locally cached content and databases
Delete locally cached content and databases?
Allow sites to request access to your location
Clear location access for all websites
Save usernames and passwords for websites
Remember data I type in forms for later use
Show warning if there\'s a problem with a site\'s certificate
Allow sites to save and read cookie data
Override a website\'s request to control zoom behavior
Black becomes white and vice versa

The page you\'re trying to view contains data that has already been submitted (\"POSTDATA\"). If you resend the data, any action the form on the page carried out (such as a search or online purchase) will be repeated.
Allow this site to open a pop-up window?
USB storage is required to download %s.
An SD card is required to download %s.
The USB storage is busy. To allow downloads, touch Turn Off USB Storage in the notification.
The SD card is busy. To allow downloads, touch Turn Off USB Storage in the notification.
Delete all data stored by this website?
This site can currently access your location
This site can\'t currently access your location
Clear location access for this website?
Delete all website data and location permissions?
Open history in new tabs (%s pages)
A folder with the same name already exists
The bookmark is already in top level
Use MIUI-integrated apps for faster smoother performance
Set search engine for title bar
Swipe from the left or right edge of the screen to switch between tabs
You\'re at the top of the page
You\'ve reached the bottom of the page
This is the first history item
This is the last history item
"Signing into Google sites using %s in the background
This site can access your location. Change this on the Settings > Advanced > Website data screen.
": Allow browser to preload high confidence search results in the background"
": Allow browser to preload linked webpages"
": Allow browser to preload videos when server allows"
": Allow browser to preload images when server allows"
Allow browser to preload images when connected to Wi-Fi
Always allow browser to preload images
"Browser won\'t use mobile network to preload webpages or to display images"
"Browser won\'t use mobile network to preload webpages or to display images"
Open new tab behind the current tab
Browser can\'t open a new tab until you close another tab
You\'re incognito! Webpages you view in this tab won\'t appear in your browser history.
This site may be a security risk
A file with the same name already exists, do you want to overwrite it?
An invalid character was removed from the file name
"Download complete! Ready to install upgraded version.
"Download complete: the latest version of this app is already installed"
"Common letter combinations can be entered in one press in the address bar"
"Download path is invalid, use the default download path"
USB storage is required to modify this path
An SD card is required to modify this path
If you\'re using mobile data to access the Internet, MIUI will notify you if a nearby Wi-Fi connection is available
Show recently visited sites in new tab
Disabling JavaScript may cause some websites to display incorrectly
Sync data to your cloud, and make using browser on different devices easy
Sync open tabs of browser on different devices
